mapper.select:
SELECT TW.ID, TW.PARENTID, TW.EMAIL, TW.DESCRIPTION, TW.NAME, TW.SUBDEMOID AS subDemo_id, TW.CREATEDATE, TW.PASSWORD, TW.ISVALID, TW.LOGIN_NAME AS loginName, TW.LASTUPDATEDATE FROM WD_DEMO TW WHERE
AND TW.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO WD_DEMO ( ID, PARENTID, EMAIL, DESCRIPTION, NAME, SUBDEMOID, CREATEDATE, PASSWORD, ISVALID, LOGIN_NAME, LASTUPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{email}, #{description}, #{name},
#{subDemo.id},
#{subDemo,javaType=java.lang.String},
#{createDate}, #{password}, #{isValid}, #{loginName}, #{lastUpdateDate} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM WD_DEMO TW WHERE
AND TW.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE wd_demo TW
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
EMAIL = #{email,javaType=java.lang.String},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
SUBDEMOID = #{subDemo.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
SUBDEMOID = #{subDemo,javaType=java.lang.String},
CREATEDATE = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
PASSWORD = #{password,javaType=java.lang.String},
ISVALID = #{isValid,javaType=int},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,javaType=java.lang.String},
LASTUPDATEDATE = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE TW.ID = #{id}
